publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6977 Pauline McNeill: World’s Biggest Ever Tea Dance—That the Parliament congratulates Glasgow on dancing its way into the record books by hosting the world’s biggest ever tea dance; further congratulates the Evening Times, Glasgow Life and Glasgow Housing Association for hosting the event; celebrates the efforts of all those who took part; recognises that this event demonstrates the importance of keeping healthy, and believes that it has further promoted active lifestyles in the city.
S3M-6977 World’s Biggest Ever Tea Dance (lodged on 13 September 2010) Jamie Hepburn*, Sarah Boyack*
S3M-6977 World’s Biggest Ever Tea Dance (lodged on 13 September 2010) Jack McConnell*

S3M-6977 Pauline McNeill: World’s Biggest Ever Tea Dance—That the Parliament congratulates Glasgow on dancing its way into the record books by hosting the world’s biggest ever tea dance; further congratulates the Evening Times, Glasgow Life and Glasgow Housing Association for hosting the event; celebrates the efforts of all those who took part; recognises that this event demonstrates the importance of keeping healthy, and believes that it has further promoted active lifestyles in the city. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Sarah Boyack, Jack McConnell
S3M-6977 World’s Biggest Ever Tea Dance (lodged on 13 September 2010) Johann Lamont*
